api_list.api_description: Retrieves all available symbols for trading.

query: Can you provide a list of all cryptocurrencies available for trading and their corresponding symbols?

api_list.api_description: Returns price data of a single cryptocurrency.

required_parameters.name: coin_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the cryptocurrency (e.g., btc-bitcoin).

optional_parameters.name: quotes
optional_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fiat currencies or other cryptocurrency symbols for price data.

api_list.api_description: Retrieves information about recent trading activity for the symbol.

query: What is the current price of Bitcoin in USD, and can you also provide its recent trading activity?

api_list.api_description: Retrieves price feed for all trading pairs.

query: Provide a global overview of the cryptocurrency market and show the current price feed for all trading pairs.

api_list.api_description: Returns detailed information about a single coin.

required_parameters.name: coin_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the cryptocurrency to retrieve data for.

api_list.api_description: Retrieves extra detail on supported symbols.

query: Please provide detailed information about Ethereum and its trading symbol details.
